name: careful
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: giving a lot of attention to what you are doing so that you do not have an accident, make a mistake, or damage something

example.eg: Be careful where you put that hot pan.
example.egtrans: 要注意把热锅放在合适的地方。

example.eg: Be careful to look both ways when you cross the road.
example.egtrans: 过马路时要注意向两边看。

example.eg: Michael is a very careful worker.
example.egtrans: 迈克尔工作起来很细心。

example.eg: After careful consideration of your proposal, I regret to say that we are unable to accept it.
example.egtrans: 仔细考虑了你的建议后，我很遗憾地告诉你我们不能接受。

example.eg: He's in a really foul temper so be careful (about/of) what you say to him.
example.egtrans: 他心情很糟，所以跟他说话要当心。
